statements.sql: select `id` from `cates` where `lft` >= '40' and `rgt` <= '42' for update

update `cates` set `lft` = CASE
WHEN `lft` BETWEEN 40 AND 40 THEN `lft` + 42 - 40
WHEN `lft` BETWEEN 41 AND 42 THEN `lft` + 40 - 41
ELSE `lft` END, `rgt` = CASE
WHEN `rgt` BETWEEN 40 AND 40 THEN `rgt` + 42 - 40
WHEN `rgt` BETWEEN 41 AND 42 THEN `rgt` + 40 - 41
ELSE `rgt` END, `parent_id` = CASE
WHEN `id` = '22' THEN '1'
ELSE `parent_id` END, `updated_at` = '2016-10-24 16:51:11' where (`lft` between '40' and '42' or `rgt` between '40' and '42') order by `cates`.`lft` asc
